name: entitySave
description: Saves or updates data of the entity and all related entities to the database.

params.name: entity
params.description: Name of the entity that must be saved in the database.

params.name: forceInsert
params.description: If true, then ColdFusion always tries to insert the entity as a new record.

examples.title: Save a new ORM entity
examples.description: Use entitySave to save a newly created entity.
